# Problem 1
```{r}
#load in library and dataset
library(tidyverse)
library(moderndive)
data("early_january_weather")
```


```{r}
weather_scat = ggplot(early_january_weather, aes(x = time_hour, y  = temp, color = "humid")) + geom_point()
weather_scat
ggsave("weather_scat.pdf")
```
